name: Cassius Ryder
description: Cassius Ryder is a well-known ripperdoc and a tattoo artist inNight City. In his early life he personally knew famousrocker,Johnny Silverhand. Some time later he got his ownclinic and tattoo salon, located on Pershing Street inNorthside,Watson, and created his own chain of ripperdoc clinics, all going under the nameDoc Ryder. By2077, he was very well connected with Night City'smercenaryworld, as well asfixerWakako Okadaand being known in theAfterlifecircles.He benefited from theMaxTacraid on a black ripperdoc clinic located nearby, as the people that used to visit them for services now had to...
